lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: We sell communication services and equipment to businesses in the US.

lender.name: John Naber
lender.loan_because: I like to see people put their own energy behind the gift.
lender.occupational_info: I speak to business people about how to be more productive.

lender.name: Jimmy & Leslie
lender.occupation: Leslie: Speech Therapist Jimmy: Blood center
lender.loan_because: We believe in empowering people to support themselves. Having your own business provides such a wonderful feeling of pride to be able to support your family. We wish you much success!!
lender.occupational_info: Leslie works with children who do not talk well and who have learning problems. Jimmy works for a blood center that supplies hospitals with blood and blood products.

lender.name: Tamah
lender.loan_because: I feel this is a way to foster change in the world, one person at a time. I want to empower other women to be independent and self-supporting.
lender.occupational_info: My company helps busy women create their best life. We give them the knowledge, tools and resources they need to live lighter and improve, not only their lifestyle, but also the environment we share.

lender.name: Troy, Jenn and Ely
lender.loan_because: We see an opportunity to put the Golden Rule into action and help our "neighbor." We also think it's a great example to set for our son.
lender.occupational_info: Jenn is a chemistry professor at a liberal arts university. Troy works as a sustainability coordinator at the university which means he helps the school act responsibly with respect to resource usage.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Dylan
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is a great way to help people in developing parts of the world. It gives me a sense of accomplishment when I know that I helped someone who is less fortunate than me.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to a community that has offered me so much.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: It helps people who don't have all the things I have and lets me have an impact on someone else's life.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I know what its like to need a hand, and have been lucky to have that help when I needed it. Now I can extend that to others.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small farm (by Australian standards) and raise beef cows. I also drive the local school bus.

lender.name: Osvaldo Ojeda
lender.loan_because: it's my responsibility and obligation as an individual, especially if I have the means to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to lend others a simple hand.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: everyone can use a little help sometime.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: To me, the political term "democracy" generally stands for global corporate capitalism, and the only vote we have with real power is our dollar. I vote for microfinance because, well...it's obvious now, isn't it?
lender.occupational_info: I write software for the internet.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I've had a few set backs this year and still consider myself to be incredibly fortunate. I want to share some of that luck with others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find a place to run their business so that they can earn a living, employ others and realize their dreams.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I can and therefore I should.

lender.name: Frankie
lender.loan_because: This loan was a gift to me. This is my first time to participate in this process. I am looking forward to building on this experience and hope that it will make progress toward a more sustainable and peaceful planet.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a newspaper in Madison, Wisconsin. I work in the customer service department with software programs that help our staff do a better job and the company make a profit. The software programs monitor staff performance and company revenue.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I solve flow problems.

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: Because I feel bad for all of the needy people in the world, so I decided that I should be one of the people that help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 5th grade student.

lender.name: Erick
lender.loan_because: Microlending can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit as a volunteer manager.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: my mommy bought me a gift certificate, and I want to help out other people.
lender.occupational_info: junior kindergarten student

lender.name: MARY JO
lender.loan_because: I truly believe in helping people who are motivated to help themselves and are willing to work hard to accomplish their goals.

lender.name: David H.M. Lambert
lender.occupational_info: I am an actor and owner of a recording studio.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: there is nothing wrong with doing the right thing.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help others in need, people that just need a little help to make a huge difference in their lives. We are all connected, we should all care about the needs of others :)

lender.name: Jamaliah
lender.loan_because: I can arrange loans from associates for needful small entrepreneurs in roselle industry.. And i would like to raise awareness in roselle-based products.
lender.occupational_info: I am a consultant for micro enterprise n focus on the stevian-roselle integrated industry through "edible garden and spinplot farming" for thecdevelopment of "one village one product".

lender.name: Dawn & Tristan
lender.loan_because: It's fun and I want my son to learn & think about people in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I provide administrative support to the photography department.

lender.name: Amina Hoque
lender.loan_because: I believe we all have the power to change the lives of others and impact people in many ways. My mission is to do just that each and everday. I want to always be proud of the person I am and to know that I give all of my heart as well as the wisdom I have been blessed enough to learn throughout my journey.
lender.occupational_info: I have been dedicated to helping and impacting the lives of others because I truly do believe in people and the ability to affect worldwide change with love and positive actions.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.occupational_info: My job is to help students learn how to enjoy reading and to write well.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I really believe people can solve their own cultural problems if given the opportunity to help their family first.

lender.name: Connor
lender.loan_because: I want to make a person's life better.

lender.name: Mick
lender.loan_because: I prefer an enterprising person who needs the money to use it, rather than my bank, which has plenty.
lender.occupational_info: I help engineers and scientists to write good business reports and proposals in English, especially if their first language is not English.

lender.name: Brett Baker
lender.loan_because: Because I believe in the power of Love and Service.
lender.occupational_info: Film & Television

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people so that they can make life better for their families and communities.

lender.name: jesse
lender.loan_because: I hope to be of service to other people throughout the world as we humans begin to realize equality and social justice on a Global scale. We are all human. We should all live to serve our fellow humans.
lender.occupational_info: I can build anything and have many years experience constructing many things, mostly housing, but I also write and educate myself and others, with my attempts to better understand how humans live.

lender.name: KeukaGuys
lender.loan_because: What a great way to help people around the world.

lender.name: Carter Boys
lender.loan_because: we are very blessed where we live. Our Aunt gave us the opportunity to share with someone else.

lender.name: Jitendra
lender.loan_because: i have the money to :p.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It's fun and easy!
lender.occupational_info: I recruit, train, and support Kiva Fellows through all stages of their Fellowship.

lender.name: EmiLaine's Mom
lender.loan_because: I would like to give others an opportunity to succeed and better themselves as well as the lives of those they care for.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I want to bless others in love and joy :-)

lender.name: Joan/Terry/Jim
lender.occupation: Human resources manager, housewife, retired banker
lender.loan_because: we have been blessed and we want to help others

lender.name: Latif
lender.occupational_info: I am a telecommunications engineer.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I want to help others, especially women, to become self-sufficient and build their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adults job skills.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want to help people pursue their goals despite the odds that may be against them.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: it is good for the world
lender.occupational_info: I move packages all over the world

lender.loan_because: self-sustaining small businesses are the best way out of poverty and independence from external aid.

lender.name: Clark Family
lender.loan_because: Everyone who has ambition and drive should have the chance to succeed

lender.name: Katharine

lender.occupational_info: I help in the development of children

lender.name: Genevieve
lender.loan_because: I care!

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the chance to make a better life.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I want to give back. As a physician in training, I am working to be in a position to help people directly with my work, but in the meanwhile this is something I can do to stay connected to the global community.
lender.occupational_info: I am training in pediatrics. It's a bit like Scrubs, but a bit less surreal.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: I am so grateful for the loan that allowed me to go to university.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, U.S.A., with my practice focused on family law and domestic relations cases.

lender.name: eric
lender.loan_because: I'd rather help out others instead of only making nominal interest rates on savings/checking accounts.

lender.name: James

lender.occupational_info: A number cruncher, bean counter, and money planner.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: this is really a great idea

lender.occupational_info: We develop role playing video games.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I got lucky and others didn't.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to make a change in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Student and working with animals.

lender.name: Mark and Annette
lender.loan_because: it's a small part of making the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Mark spends most of his time working for a multi-national corp. that produces radiation therapy equipment used to treat cancer, while Annette spends her time chasing after him, the kids and the dogs.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: unemployed, looking for another job.

lender.name: Perry Belcher
lender.loan_because: Because it changes everything
lender.occupational_info: I am a marketer

lender.name: Loni+TR

lender.occupational_info: Loni teaches college biology. TR works for the people of Los Angeles County.

lender.name: Carlota
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are less fortunate than I am.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying for a Master of Human Rights

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: "An individual has not started living until he can rise above the narrow confines of his individualistic concerns to the broader concerns of all humanity." - Dr. MLK Jr.
lender.occupational_info: Recent college graduate hoping to work in the non-profit/ international development sector.

lender.name: kArTiK
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the entrepreneurship passion within. I admire ones spirit to overcome all odds and stand on his own feet.
lender.occupational_info: I am a software engineer working to develop critical software for the organisations in the financial domain.

lender.name: Emi
lender.loan_because: this is the least I could do in the limited free time I have, to make a difference and (slowly) balance out the imbalances of the world.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve success.
lender.occupational_info: I formerly worked as a nurse. I am married and have raised two great children.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I think it's wrong that so many people give up on their hopes and dreams just because they don't have the money.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an Artist. I paint pictures and make designs.

lender.name: Butch
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with more than many others and want to help bless those people listed here where possible. This looks like a good place to do that!
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer technician.

lender.name: Ole-Morten
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Opensource software developer and adviser.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: We all should!
lender.occupational_info: I develop new analytical methods for environmental analysis

lender.name: Yasmin
lender.loan_because: I Want to help empower ambitious people in their own communities; with the belief that these small but important business will have a strong ripple effect to each individual within those communities and the communities beyond their own.

lender.name: Henriette
lender.loan_because:
I'm grateful to have the opportunity and the means to.
It's nice to be important, but it's more important to be nice.
lender.occupational_info: nursing and caring for the elderly in a hospital.

lender.name: Tseleng
lender.loan_because: i am currently selling my art work and design services. i need finance to frame the current collection of paintings i have so as to sell them and make a profit. i am currently a student at thenuniversity of the witwatersrand studying towards my degree, hence not enough time to get a vacational job as architecture is quite a demanding subject to study.
lender.occupational_info: my services range from house alterations, entirior design and deco to fashion design and personal stylist. right now my main occupation is the artworks that i am working on.

lender.name: Hugo Penedones
lender.loan_because: I would prefer to live in a world where people are more satisfied with their lives. Alleviating poverty will hopefully have that effect.

lender.name: Clary
lender.loan_because: By reaching out to others in need we bring down the barriers that seperate us.
lender.occupational_info: I manage an Automotive repair facility with 32 mechanics working under me

lender.name: Wolfgang
lender.loan_because: I have all I need. And some not.
lender.occupational_info: Im open to new things. I like social "things"

lender.name: Michael and family
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to get ahead and I would enjoy being a part of someone else's success.
lender.occupational_info: Police K9 officer/ Own and operate a Property management business in a town made up mostly of 2nd home owners.

lender.name: The Daugherty Family
lender.loan_because: We enjoy the opportunity to help other entrepreneurs and families. As struggling entrepreneurs ourselves, we feel blessed that God has always provided for us in our times of need and we are thankful to have the chance to help others.
lender.occupational_info: We run a small business that manufactures woodwork and cabinets for schools, offices, churches, stores, etc.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I loan because it brings me much happiness to help those less fortunate than myself. I am a firm believer in doing onto others as you would have done onto you, you never know when you might be in the same situation,
lender.occupational_info: I am a work from home mom, and crafter. I am partner with my husband for our side home business as well.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: So I can help people around the world.

lender.name: Dan & Cynthia
lender.occupational_info: Dan is a product manager for a large medical supplier. Cynthia is a professor/scientist doing drug addiction research at a large university.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance and want to directly help support people who are working hard to survive in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an international development agency, focusing on microfinance and emergency response.

lender.name: Bristol Elementary
lender.loan_because: As a Kindergarten to Grade Five School (ages 5-11) we believe in teaching our students good citizenship both at local and international level.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: As human beings you have the obligation to improve the quality of life for all human beings.
lender.occupational_info: Very gratifying! We work with governments from developing countries to put laws in place that will achieve economic growth, that will hopefully trickle down to the respective citizens. Our mission is to "Foster Prosperity through the Rule of Law".

lender.name: Rory
lender.loan_because: It's good for the individuals who borrow, the global poplation and the environment. The misery of the poverty trap also contributes to global environmental damage. I also support a school in Kenya (www.furahaproject.com).
lender.occupational_info: I build and maintain Web sites.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I believe that a better world can be realized through small actions, wealth generates wealth--- one person is able to expand or own their own business, the standard of living for them and their family is raised, their capacity is raised and they buy more raw materials, the extra income is spent locally... the effect ripples out into their community, improving not just their own situation, but ultimately their neighbors' as well.

lender.name: Justin Mihalick
lender.loan_because: I believe in the age old tradition of charitable lending. Thanks to KIVA and their field partners, it is easy to empower an entrepreneur in the developing world.

lender.name: Jose Luis
lender.loan_because: Sometimes the best way to help others is to provide them the means to help themselves.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with much and believe that with the right help and the commitment to self and family, the individuals to whom I can help give this loan can also be blessed in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for making sure that environmental controls are in place to allow for the safe reuse of contaminated lands.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: I admire people who have a strong desire to exact change in their lives and by doing so improves their lives and lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: Spreading peace and love through art and music

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: People helped me when I needed assistance. I am now able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people who are studying to become more effective pastors. I write books and articles, many which use stories extensively.

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping entrepreneurs succeed, especially in third-world countries.

lender.name: Karen and Cameron
lender.loan_because: we believe an essential step on the road to peace is eliminating poverty.

lender.name: Rodrigo
lender.loan_because: i like to

lender.name: Tobias
lender.loan_because: I can help to make the world a little better.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I feel everyone should be given the chance to improve their situation. I am particularly interested in helping women who are hard workers helping to raise a family.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a local college helping to maintain our website. I help students and instructors with their online classes and also with website creations and updates.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: It just seems right to help when you can.
lender.occupational_info: Georgina has been a manager in private business for many years. Kevin is in charge of a simulation lab at a college that is used to train medical professionals.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I believe that we can make a difference, if we all join in. It is important that people believe that they are contributing to their success. I think that people who receive a loan, are successful and pay the loan back are far more likely to have self satisfaction.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.
lender.occupational_info: I am a software entrepreneur; I develop communications software and internet solutions. I also have a photography business on the side.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: How can you hear their stories and not help? We're too blessed to just listen. We have to do something.
lender.occupational_info: I'm teaching and training in chemistry at the University of Memphis.

lender.name: M. Ali
lender.loan_because: I consider myself fortunate because others have helped me and I would like to help others now that I am in a position to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I am about to finish college and I recently started my own retail business selling electronics

lender.name: Sora
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in need and am interested in small businesses around the world.

lender.name: pk-SF
lender.loan_because: i am interested in cultural entrepreneurism.
lender.occupational_info: Globalization of client services functions across an organization.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I think that this is a great process! I love the idea of people being successful in their own business.

lender.name: Chuck and Roni
lender.loan_because: We are blessed and love to help when and where we can.
lender.occupational_info: Chuck designs future aircraft carriers and Roni manages training for a large bank.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to share what has been given to me. I will continue to give to Kiva because I think it is awesome to help people who are trying to make better lives for themselves and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 42 year old divorced mother of three boys. I have recently begun a new life and am currently in school full time to earn a degree in Nursing.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Where much is given much is expected!
lender.occupational_info: I plan travel for corporations to take groups of people to see different places in the world.

lender.name: Cassie & Les
lender.loan_because: I have so much more than so many people in the world. These people asking for loans are asking for so little really. If I can contribute just $25 that will make a difference for them in their lives, I don't see how I can't.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Executive Assistant. I am a public employee working for an agency that helps other people in my state to become more independent, healthy and safe. We provide services for families, children, elderly men and woman, children with special developmental needs, people who have been injured and need help learning new skills to find work, and people who need financial assistance for food, shelter and utilities.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I have much and they have little
lender.occupational_info: I design with plants to make a pleasing beautiful landscape for people to enjoy

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I too am a person on this earth...we're all connected...

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.loan_because: people need to share.
lender.occupational_info: changing.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: Have a penny, leave a penny. Need a penny, take a penny. Elsewhere these pennies become dollars....

lender.name: D. M.
lender.loan_because: it's nice to know that my small contribution will help make a difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I study law and medicine. One day, I want to help people in an even bigger way!

lender.name: P.J. & Donna
lender.loan_because: We can.

lender.name: Tim O
lender.loan_because: I don't have much, but my money is worth so much more in a developing economy than in my own. It's a great way to help people who also want economic freedom.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help people use less electricity and use clean, healthy methods to create it.

lender.name: Krijn
lender.loan_because: I believe people can and have to help themselves. I don't like powerfull rich people who exclude a big poor group, like some presidents do.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze and design manufacturing equipment and consumer products, such as shavers.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: "It's not enough to have lived. We should be determined to live for something. May I suggest that it be creating joy for others, sharing what we have for the betterment of personkind, bringing hope to the lost and love to the lonely." Leo Buscaglia
lender.occupational_info: I am a fulltime student at Florida State University!

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: All is owned by God, we only are caretakers while we are here
lender.occupational_info: Employ people in Asia for United States companies

lender.name: The Barg Family
lender.loan_because: As a family we are committed to supporting sustainable agriculture and community. We feel Kiva is helping to promote this philosophy.
lender.occupational_info: Steve is an Executive Director for a non-profit land organization and is an Environmental Educator. Hannah is a "Young Naturalist" and is working to promote environmentalism in her own community. Susan and Aaron are helping to spread awareness and as a family we are committed to supporting local farmers.

lender.name: valeria
lender.loan_because: I need loan because I wrote a book and I need have money for to publish and to invest in marketing and sell my book.
lender.occupational_info: Actually I work into hospital as a dentist, in other city, Divinopolis. I 'm always traveling because my work and I want work only as a writer because I need to be more time at home for to care my two sons. I need to stop work in other city.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: I grew up in Medellin, COLOMBIA, where my love for helping and supporting people on health, nutrition and education was developed.
lender.occupational_info:
After getting bachelors as Nutritionist and my Master in Public Health, I went for training for several years at the Antioquia University Hospital (Colombia) and I worked in the field as Public Health Officer, supervising nutritional and public health activities in isolated towns.
I went to Honduras as a United Nations Volunteer to work at the Salvadorian Refugee camps, where I got acquainted with MSF people and work.
In Equatorial Guinea, I worked as Program Manager of United Nations Volunteers where I improved my administrative and managerial skills.
With International Medical Corps I went to Angola in two different occasions, working in displaced persons camp, in charge of nutritional assessments, training of community health workers, therapeutic feeding and training.
With CARE I went to Sudan as provincial Team leader for a maternal and child survival project in the middle of the dessert in Bara town (Kordofan State), I supervised 60 people and I got excellent relationships with local people and government in a time of difficult political constraints.
I was placed in Somalia with World Vision International as Primary Care Officer, working in TB control, immunization, training and distribution of medicines.
Unfortunately in 1994, our compound in Baidoa (SOMALIA) suffered a terrorist attack and I was airlifted to Chicago for medical treatment.
I lived in Chicago from 1994 to 2005, where I completed my second master degree in Training and Development and improved my computer skills.
In Chicago I worked for the County Health Department and I was an instructor for several local universities and colleges.
Currently I am working in Planned Parenthood in Florida, as Community Health educator, in the area of HIV-AIDS, and Reproductive health.
I think that the above description of my past experience is sufficient to let you know about my interest, aspiration and philosophy of life.

lender.name: The Easton Family
lender.loan_because: We loan because we like to help.

lender.name: DANIELLE
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I know that if all come together, as cliche as this sounds, we really CAN make a difference. I'm at least willing to try, and don't want to turn my back on these people when I know I can help.

lender.name: Curtis
lender.loan_because: God doesn't sit on the couch.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to help the people of my own community to protect them and fight crime.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: as Maya Angelou says, " While I know myself as a creation of God, I am also obligated to realize and remember that everyone else and everything else are also God's creation.
lender.occupational_info: I work to increase people's knowledge and awareness about the environment, so they can have the skills to address the environmental challenges and take responsible action.

lender.name: Anneke
lender.loan_because: Ik vond het meteen toen ik ervan hoorde een prima idee om rechtstreeks te lenen aan anderen, die er actief een beter bestaan mee op kunnen bouwen en na terugbetaling aan de volgende lenen!

lender.name: Mary Francis
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in and work to make it happen: JUST DISTRIBUTION OF THE WORLD'S RESOURCES.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of over 100 Elders. They live in my facility. My Staff and I are responsible for them 24/7. I love what I do.

lender.name: TAMMIE
lender.loan_because: I feel that it's our responsibility as women to help other women around the world living in areas that are not as financially blessed as us.
lender.occupational_info: I am disabled now but I worked in accounting / finance

lender.name: Brad and Carlos
lender.loan_because: It helps people build small businesses that help their communities and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Brad is a lawyer who works for the California courts to improve the system of justice. Carlos is a student studying film.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate in 2006 and was turned onto this wonderful opportunity to help! Since then I have given gift certificates as gifts to help spread the cause.
lender.occupational_info:
Adam is enthusiastic to be involved with a number of non-profit and organizations dedicated to making this world a better place.
Adam completed his undergraduate degree from Old Dominion University in Norfolk, Virginia in 2008 with a B.S. in Human Communications and a minor in Sociology. During his senior year at O.D.U. he was exposed to many different aspects of human and societal development. Through this experience, he developed an interest in different forms of human rights violations and discovered the field of conflict resolution. While preparing and applying to graduate school, Adam took a graduate class in Conflict Analysis and Resolution at George Mason University. During this class, Adam rediscovered and connected with his passion of helping people.
Adam recently started attending University of Denver in the fall 2009 and is pursuing a M.A. in Conflict Resolution with emphases in higher education and global affairs. Once his degree is completed, he plans to pursue a career in global conflict and eventually sees himself in the field of higher education teaching.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: The Noble Eightfold Path
lender.occupational_info: I teach young adults how to ask and answer questions using the scientific method. I also teach courses on the worldwide ancient and modern history of how human beings seek to understand their own brains and social nature.
